rukus.text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Zhongren yiwei tamen de ziyou de shuo “women yi xindaole” er bu shou kaoyan ma
Wo que yi kaoyan zai tamen zhiqian de ren. An la biding yao zhidao shuo shihua zhe, biding yao zhidao shuohuang zhe
Nandao zuo'e de ren yiwei tamen neng tao chu wo de fawang ma? Tamen de panding zhen elie
Fan xiwang huijian an la zhe, shei dou yingdang zhidao an la de qixian shi biding jianglin de, an la que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Shei fendou, dou zhi wei ziji er fendou, an la que shi wu qiu yu zhong shijie de
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo biding gouxiao tamen de zui'e, wo biding yi tamen de xingwei de zui you de baochou shangci tamen
Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu; ruguo ta lia leling ni yong ni suo bu zhidao de dongxi pei wo, name, ni buyao fucong ta lia. Nimen yao guiyu wo, wo yao ba nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo biding shi tamen ru yu shanren zhi lie

Youxie ren shuo:“Women yi xin'an lale.” Dang tamen wei an la er shou pohai de shihou, tamen ba zhongren de pohai dangzuo an la de xingfa. Ruguo yuanzhu cong nimen de zhu jianglin, tamen biding shuo:“Women que shi yu nimen tong zai yiqi de.” Nandao an la bushi zhidao shiren de xiongjin de ma
An la dique zhidao xindao zhe, dique zhidao wei xinzhe
Buxindao zhe dui xindao zhe shuo:“Nimen zunshou women de jiao dao ba! Rang women fudan nimen de zuiguo.” Qishi, tamen jue buneng danfu tamen de yidian zuiguo, tamen que shi shuohuang de
Tamen biding danfu ziji de zhongdan, zai jia shang bie de zhongdan, fuhuo ri tamen duiyu ziji suo weizao de huangyan bi shoushen wen
